pageDescription: Please describe your dataset in the form below.
title: Title
datasetLinkPlaceholder: Where can we find the data
datasetImportancePlaceholder: Please explain why this dataset is important
priority: How would you rate its importance
priorityHigh: Essential — GBIF have no data in this area
priorityMedium: Important — GBIF have little data in this area
priorityLow: It would be a nice supplement to the existing data
bibliographicReferencePlaceholder: Link to related article if any
successMessage: We will review your dataset suggestion and get back to you as soon as possible.
errorTitle: An error occurred while submitting your dataset suggestion
